definition: the strokes of a character/calligraphy and painting
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: The organizer put many valuable works of calligraphy, and paintings up for auction.
sentences.chinese: 這次拍賣會的主辦方會拿出多件珍貴的字畫參拍。

sentences.english: Technology introductions The brocade is the colored silk production with decorative patterns or calligraphies and paintings.
sentences.chinese: 神奇的東方之花織錦是指有花紋或字畫的彩色絲織品。

sentences.english: Poetry paintings, they will only painting.
sentences.chinese: 詩文字畫，他們只會繪畫。

sentences.english: Operation and collection of celebrity pictures and more than a decade.
sentences.chinese: 經營和收藏名人字畫十多年。

sentences.english: The antiques, cultural relics, scripts and paintings available at this market are also inexpensive.
sentences.chinese: 紅橋市場的文物字畫和古玩也以價格低廉爲特色。

sentences.english: Later, the chef carve calligraphy and painting on the melon, and the dish becomes a famous Confucius Family dish.
sentences.chinese: 日後又在瓜皮刻上字畫，爲孔府菜一道名饌。

sentences.english: Here are some of history's famous display of calligraphy and painting, we can enjoy the look.
sentences.chinese: 這裏陳列着一些歷史的名人字畫，大家可以欣賞一下。

sentences.english: You probably know this kind of puzzles.
sentences.chinese: 你可能知道這種字畫迷。

sentences.english: He also created a number of celebrity pictures and paintings of iron formation.
sentences.chinese: 他還創作了一些名人字畫的鐵拓畫。

sentences.english: He works at the Forbidden City and knows a lot about ancient calligraphy and paintings of famous people.
sentences.chinese: 故宮博物院的館員，對古代名人字畫很有研究。

sentences.english: Some tourists who are keen on art may wish to buy antique objects as well as Chinese calligraphy and paintings.
sentences.chinese: 愛好藝術的遊客，還可以在中國購買字畫和古玩。

sentences.english: Absent here were gorgeous ornaments, exquisitely-framed calligraphy or paintings.
sentences.chinese: 既看不到華麗的擺設，也沒有裝裱考究的字畫。

sentences.english: Zheng's artworks always gives a thin and powerful feeling.
sentences.chinese: 鄭板橋的字畫往往給人一種又瘦又硬的感覺。

definition: Four Treasures of the Study, namely 筆|笔[bi3], 墨[mo4], 紙|纸[zhi3] and 硯|砚[yan4]/the essentials of calligraphy and scholarship (idiom)
Republic of China (1912-1949)/used in Taiwan as the name of the calendar era (e.g. 民國六十年|民国六十年 is 1971, the 60th year after 1911)
